name: FROG STACK
description:
MOVE FROGS

STACK FROGS

BUILD FROG STACKS

GET TO THE FLAGS

---------------------------------------

Controls:

Move: WASD / Arrow Keys
Spawn Frog: Space / Shift
Pause: P / Esc
Let Out a Nice Croak: C

---------------------------------------

Made for Frog Jam 

BG Music by Ozzed
Croak sound by snottyboy

More levels (and mechanics!) coming soon I just ran outta time during the jam
